description:
Operations

About the Job

- Operate all equipment in a safe, responsible, and professional manner
- Pickup and deliver to and from service centers
- Good communication skills- effectively present information in one-on-one and small group situations to customers, clients, and other employees of the organization
- Ability to effectively communicate with the shift supervisor, co-workers, and other departments on work-related issues promptly
- M-F Schedule- Start time 6-8am
- LTL- 10-17 stops per day- Palletized freight of all kinds
- Pallet Jack from dock to truck
- New Peterbilt Day Cabs- 53' Trailers

Requirements

- Must be at least 21 years of age
- At least 2 years of commercial driving experience is required
- Must possess a valid Class A Commercial Driver's License (CDL)
- Must maintain an acceptable driving record in compliance with DOT requirements.
- Valid Medical Card
- No more than 3 of combination- At fault accidents or Moving Violations
- Must pass a background and drug test (signed up for Clearinghouse)
